name: NORTHWEST PIPE COMPANY
description: Manufacturer of steel pipe used in water projects.
sampleDescriptions: Track issues associated with Clean Water Act and corrosion.
Track implementation of Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act (WIIN Act) PL 114-322
Assist in communications with the Bureau of Reclamation with regard education opportunities on modern pipe construction methods, standards, and projects.
Assist and advise to ensure corrosion standards for water transporting pipe are not reduced in appropriations language and continue to be based upon science and professional engineering standards for

Track implementation of Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act (WIIN Act) PL 114-322

Track 2018 Water Resources Development Act progress.
